reviews.review:
黎明杀机入坑是因为看见主播玩这个游戏，感觉很有意思。入手之后一段时间并没有认真去玩，因为这个对新手玩家难度有点高，不太好上手。看主播玩游戏，对萌新上手这个游戏有很多好处，我也勉强会了一些。随着游戏时间的增加，就会感觉越来越有意思。
当初我以为这个游戏会往竞技方面去做，因为具有竞技性质的游戏会活得很久，我是希望杀机能够一直做下去。但是制作组并不这样想，仍然希望这是一款恐怖游戏，不希望两边不断的去平衡，于是在1.5版本加强屠夫，人类上线虚弱机制。屠夫在这个版本追人能力很强，我相信只要不是特别萌新的屠夫，一般都能带走两个人。对于制作组希望出现的情况，我不做评论，因为这确实是一款恐怖游戏，人家这样修改并没有什么错。很多人都说这版本弃坑什么的，我觉得其实还好啦，并不是说有多么难打，只是不能像以前那样继续秀屠夫，对于救人修电机要权衡一下了。屠夫贴脸守尸就疯狂开电机走了就行了，只要这个人给其他人争取足够多的时间，屠夫这样守尸分肯定是不够的。对于很多拔皇，我想说这是不尊重其他游戏玩家，给其他玩家带来不好的体验，也给那些喜欢守尸的屠夫有机可趁，拿到足够多的分数。
总的来说，黎明杀机我还是推荐的，希望制作组认真把这个游戏发展下去，也希望有更多的人加入黎明杀机～

*********************************分割线***********************************（7月29日）

前两天出了兔子屠夫dlc，让我对这个游戏的体验特别差，上游戏发现板子改得越来越少，LT点的改动，你改个双窗请问怎么溜屠夫，上面版本都出了杀戮机制，屠夫追人杀人比很久以前本来就轻松很多，现在改了LT，四个1，大量削减板子数量，作为人类玩家该怎么玩？再来说一说新dlc，兔子屠夫的出现，我觉得再一次大幅度影响了游戏的平衡，远程扔斧头，超远距离，只要屠夫会玩的话，翻板子翻窗必吃一斧，红色顶级配件一斧头劈死人类，人类怎么玩请告诉我？制作组从我刚入坑开始，就一直无脑增强屠夫，人类越来越弱，刚出屠夫这两天，很多很多刷血点的人，如果这些人猥琐一点，怂一点，正常的刷出技能来玩我可以理解，但是这两天出现了各种满技能顶配红斧一刀兔子，人类的体验非常差，而且进游戏排到老外各种裂空，服务器卡的飞起，总的来说现在玩黎明杀机可谓是难上加难，当然这是对于人类玩家来说就是这样，毕竟我是主玩人类的玩家，现在人类有什么资本去对抗屠夫呢？很多有趣的玩法，都是因为屠夫的强势以及地图的削弱而不会再有。就如同以前的拆迁队等，虽然我承认，以前拆迁队虽然对屠夫来讲或许有点难受，但是铁手的存在可以来制约它，钩子的再生对拆迁队来说无疑是一种毁灭性的打击，现在很少有看到拆钩子的存在。前几天为了杀机买了光头，现在想一想感觉有点不值，制作组对屠夫的无脑增强以及对bug的态度还有就是这么多个版本都不解决屠夫贴脸守尸的情况，我真的感到非常失望，对这款游戏已没有当初的热情。所以至少这个版本我是不推荐新手来玩这款游戏的，因为你的游戏体验将会非常差劲

******************************分割线************************************（10月28日）

更新游戏后进去玩了几把，我觉得新屠夫做得挺不错的，噩梦视野以及帮助队友摆脱梦境的效果我觉得做得挺棒的，游戏的平衡性依然屠夫强势，遇到新屠夫很多人都说人类玩不了啊什么的，或许是我很久没打玩低段位的缘故，并没有觉得这个新屠夫特别厉害（大概玩的人都不怎么会吧），但是确实还是有点强势的，人类进入噩梦后行动速度大幅度降低，据说屠夫还能透视人类的位置（暂时还没买，所以没有玩过屠夫视角），屠夫的技能也很强势，人类修的电机越多，屠夫的移动速度越快。这些对于人类玩家来说确实体验不太好。但是，这个dlc做得确实挺棒的，听说这个版本能够360度救人，还没试过哈哈，至少屠夫贴脸守尸的问题终于解决了，总的来说这个dlc大家还是值得体验一番的，这个版本推荐体验

***********************************18.11.23****************************************

我又回来继续玩了，只是越来越难遛屠夫了，新地图都不会，基本被发现转个几圈就倒地，只有老地图还能坚持遛一遛，感觉做个人类真难= 。=这个游戏还是开黑有乐趣。



总的来说，还是希望这款游戏能够越来越火，玩的人能够越来越多，能够继续走下去！
АААААААААААААААААААААААА СТРАШНА (нет, весело)
很好的一款游戏，推荐玩一下

I absolutely love this game !!!!! It always keeps me on the edge of my seat! and anyone crying about the 1.5 update stop! I haven't played for a little while 1st game back, with the killer (Hillbilly) sacrificed all 4 survivors....the next Game played as a survivor (Meg) was hooked twice, saved both times and I escaped ....Stop taking away from a beautifully crafted Balanced game and whining becaused you were hunted down murdered and sacrificed!!!!!! that is what the killer is supposed to do!!! Not escort you to the gate or walk away because you are on a hook (remember you are bait!!) And if you are a Survivor work together as a team get the generators and stop hiding in a locker!!!!!!!

We are getting close to the our one year anniversary and the bug that terminates your entire progress keeps occuring, and quite literally makes me want to commit honorable sudoku. 

10/10 will never need to look for another reason to want to kill myself ever again.

-

3 year edit: I still love the game to death, no matter the bugs, flaws or the shitty people playing it, the game is and always will be fucking great. And I will gladly stay on this ship for as long as I possibly can.

-

5 year edit: Veteran players have been shafted for years and I am one of those that are no longer able to maintain the mental fortitude required to continue playing this absolute tragedy of a game. The fun has slowly but steadily been removed from the game. It is constantly being dumbed down and the amount of handholding and questionable changes are out of this world. The only thing that matters is pushing out shit content for $ instead of fixing issues that have been with the game since it's release. Absolutely daft

This game doesnt deserve the playerbase it has. I truly wish they lose all they have, never to regain it because the players deserve so much more than this

So I got this game to play it with my friends, but they immediately told me that it's a broken game. I watched gameplay on it and it  seemed realy fun. Until I played it. It's a great idea for a game but very poorly executed. If you want to win as a killer, you have to be an almost perfect one, and that's only if you are going up against people that are as good as you at the game. But learning to play killer now is just ridiculous, I'm bad at this game, but I have a friend who is a rank 1 killer and survivor and he if goes up against anyone that that's rank 5 or lower he can literally carry the game by himself. He literally makes the killer chase him until we have all the generators up and the exit open. Long story short, survivors are broken and its not fun to play killer.

I have to write a positive yet still negative review at this time because while the game is definetely worth the buy, the survivors have too much power over a killer's strategy. Survivors can simply just pester the killer the entire time and then report you when you do something that they haven't learned how to easily counter. Plus, its 4 survivors against a killer. In the world of reporting, that means thye can gang up on you and you are 4x as far into getting kicked/baned whatever. As a survivor, l finding a good match is hard enough, extended by the long times waiting to find a potential match because nobody wants to be killer when you are just yelled at all the time.

The game is Adequate. Feels very limited. The maps lack imagination. The concept is sound but the execution feels weak. Graphics are Adequate. The survivors feel like they have no chance to flee if discovered, there is no real way to escape or fight back which I find disheartening. The kill mechanic is silly. The atmosphere of the game feels like a Rob Zombie POORLY directed film but with all the same "gritty" disturbing elements that don't work for me. I also purchased the Halloween DLC hoping for an established killer and a more creative map mechanic than just SLOWLY repairing generators. I was sadly mistaken in my assumption that some thought would be put into the DLC. All they did was change the skin on the same old boring maps and escape concepts. This was a huge miss. Overall, the game is playable, barely, but lacks any real depth and grows old REALLY fast.

This new patch (1.5) is going in the right direction. For too long survivors have complained and complained about not having the game handed to them. Since survivors make up the majority of the playerbase, the developers have had to cave multiple times. Translation: I was surviving 95% of my games at rank 1, and was not scared of the killer at all. 

This patch, it seems to level the playing field more, but to do so, they sacrificed diversity. A lot of interesting alternative killer perks have been nerfed into the ground, making killers less dynamic, and more static in playstyle. However, now you MUST respect the killer, or you will die. What was before a teabagging bait fest has now turned into an actual effort having to be put in by survivors to escape. 

Though survivor mains are now going to complain more that they maybe dropped a 5% in their winrate which was already well above the ideal 50%, this game is going in the right direction if you're looking for a true cat and mouse experience.
